City Secretary
==============

201 S Highway 287 Cactus TX 79103

[Directions](https://www.google.com/maps/place/201+S+Highway+287++Cactus+TX+79103)  
  
 Physical Address:View Map

201 S Highway 287   
Cactus, TX 79103

Mailing Address:

P.O. Box 365  
Cactus, TX 79103

Phone:

[806-966-5458](tel:8069665458)

Fax:

806-966-5771

  

Hours
-----

Monday through Friday  
8 am to 5 pm
